register.termsPoint1: We only use your information to create and secure your account.
register.termsPoint2: You can update your notification preferences at any time.
register.termsPoint3: Deleting your account will remove your data from our active systems within 30 days.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Who we are and what we‚Äôre building
about.missionBody: We aim to make world-class UI primitives accessible to every builder. BroWorld gathers community contributions, curated patterns, and inclusive guidelines so teams can ship faster together.

builders.title: Empower every builder
builders.body: Deliver opinionated defaults and accessible patterns for teams of any size.

community.title: Grow with community
community.body: Elevate contributions from maintainers across regions and celebrate open collaboration.

iteration.title: Iterate responsibly
iteration.body: Ship carefully tested releases with transparent roadmaps and measurable impact.

about.teamBody: BroWorld is maintained by a distributed group of designers, engineers, and storytellers who believe that open tooling should feel delightful.

amina.bio: Shapes the product vision and keeps the roadmap grounded in community needs.

lukas.bio: Guides the architecture and ensures every release is performant, accessible, and well tested.

clara.bio: Translates feedback into actionable docs and helps contributors feel welcome.

youssef.bio: Hosts community sessions, curates contributions, and makes sure conversations stay inclusive.

about.techBody: We lean on a modern Vue stack to keep documentation and production surfaces in sync.

techStack.nuxt: Hybrid-rendered experiences powered by file-based routing.
techStack.vuetify: Accessible design system primitives with first-class RTL support.
techStack.typescript: Type-safe authoring across components, stores, and utilities.
techStack.vitest: Fast unit and component testing for reliable releases.

2023.title: Open-sourcing the first component set
2023.description: Published the initial library foundations and onboarding guide.

2024.title: Expanding localization coverage
2024.description: Added multi-lingual content, RTL support, and community translation workflows.

2025.title: Launching collaborative workflows
2025.description: Introduced shared templates, integrated feedback loops, and improved automation.

gettingStarted.question: How do I start using BroWorld components?
gettingStarted.answer: Install the package, run the setup script, and explore the Starter templates to see best practices in action.

localization.question: Which languages are supported?
localization.answer: English, French, Arabic, German, and more translations are maintained by our community partners.

components.question: Where can I find live component examples?
components.answer: Browse the component directory to view interactive demos and copy-ready code snippets.

contributing.question: How can I contribute?
contributing.answer: Review the contribution guidelines, open an issue with your idea, and submit a pull request when you are ready.

privacy.question: How do you handle privacy requests?
privacy.answer: Submit a request through the account tools or email  and we will follow up within 72 hours.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: We usually reply within 1‚Äì2 business days.

availability.title: When we're online
availability.body: Our distributed team monitors requests Monday through Friday and rotates weekend coverage for urgent issues.

sample.longerText: This textarea grows as you type so reviewers can stress-test the auto-grow behaviour.
